title: viveel
author: viveel
content: Hello. This is Viveel!We are a startup born to help new Decentralized Projects implement best practices in Cybersecurity on Blockchain.At Viveel we aim to help you create your dApp as we follow the process from ideation to operation. Our services guarantee you greater security and lower operating costs thanks to our CSOC designed for Blockchain environments.Our services:  - Web3 Development  - Cybersecurity Consulting  - Smart Contract Audit  - Management ToolsJoin us and follow our journey.https://viveel.com

comments.author: viveel
comments.body: At Viveel we're building a No-code Smart Contract Manager and Builder.We are looking for Web3 Developers willing to join us at this early stage.If you like startups and want to be part of Viveel join us in this journey
